briefTitle: Examining the Long Term Safety, Efficacy, and Corticosteroid-sparing Effect of Certolizumab Pegol in Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multi-center Trial to Examine the Long Term Safety, Efficacy, and Corticosteroid-sparing Effect of Certolizumab Pegol in Patients With Moderate to Severe Crohn's Disease Previously Enrolled in C87059 (COSPAR I, NCT00349752).
summary: This is an open-label extension study designed to measure the safety, efficacy, and corticosteroid-sparing effect of certolizumab pegol (CDP870) in patients with moderate to severe Crohn's disease previously enrolled in C87059 (COSPAR I, NCT00349752).

primaryOutcome.measure: Occurrence of at Least One Treatment-emergent Adverse Event During This Study (Maximum 122 Weeks)
